Class Helper

java.lang.Object
helper.Helper
public class Helper extends Object
General Helper Class to assist with many operations.

    • getDivisionName

      public static String getDivisionName(int divisionID)
      Method to return a name String from an id int. Takes an ID, and compares it to divisions in the divisionList, to find a match and return the name String.

    • getCustomerName

      public static String getCustomerName(int customerID)
      Method to return a name String from an id int. Takes an ID, and compares it to customers in the customerList, to find a match and return the name String.

    • getUserName

      public static String getUserName(int userID)
      Method to return a name String from an id int. Takes an ID, and compares it to users in the userList, to find a match and return the name String.

    • getContactName

      public static String getContactName(int contactID)
      Method to return a name String from an id int. Takes an ID, and compares it to contacts in the contactList, to find a match and return the name String.

    • getContactID

      public static int getContactID(String contactName)
      Method to return an id int, from a name String. Takes a String, and compares it to contact names in the contactList, to find a match and return the id int.

    • getCountryName

      public static String getCountryName(int divisionID)
      Method to return a name String from an id int. Takes an ID, and compares it to countries in the countryList, to find a match and return the name String.

    • getDivisionID

      public static int getDivisionID(String name)
      Method to return an id int, from a name String. Takes a String, and compares it to division names in the divisionList, to find a match and return the id int.

    • appointmentReminder

      public static javafx.scene.control.Alert appointmentReminder()
      Method to check for upcoming appointments on login. Displays an alert to notify user if they have upcoming appointments or not.
